attributes.action: Enforce UK Banking Regulations For UK Paypal Customers
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Increasing numbers of UK Citizens experience problems whilst using Paypal UK, combine this with the fact that Paypal is: 

a) no longer regulated by the FSA 
b) duly licensed as a Luxembourg credit institution (ie. a bank) 

This petition requests that UK Banking Regulations are enforced for all UK Paypal Customers.

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to "Enforce UK Banking Regulations For UK Paypal Customers."

The Prime Minister's Office has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.pm.gov.uk/output/Page15644.asp

Prime Minister's Office
